item.title: Cinnamon-Sugar Air Fryer Banana Chips
item.description: Sweet, crispy, and guilt-free, these cinnamon-sugar air fryer banana chips are the perfect healthy snack that will satisfy your cravings without the guilt. Enjoy the delightful crunch and warm spices in every bite!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 25 minutes

â° Total Time: 40 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 ripe bananas
  • 2 tablespoons cinnamon
  • 1 tablespoon sugar
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the air fryer to 350Â°F (175Â°C).
  2. Slice the bananas thinly and toss them in a bowl with olive oil, cinnamon, and sugar.
  3. Arrange the banana slices in a single layer in the air fryer basket.
  4. Air fry for 15-20 minutes, shaking the basket halfway through, until crispy.

item.title: Grilled Vegetable Quinoa Salad
item.description: This Grilled Vegetable Quinoa Salad is a vibrant and nutritious dish that combines the earthy flavors of grilled vegetables with the nutty taste of quinoa. Perfect for a light lunch or as a side dish, it's both satisfying and refreshing.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 20 minutes

â° Total Time: 35 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 200g quinoa
  • 1 zucchini, diced
  • 1 bell pepper, diced
  • 1 eggplant, diced
  • 100g chickpeas, cooked
  • Juice of 1 lemon
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • Fresh mint leaves, chopped

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Cook the quinoa according to package instructions until fluffy.
  2. Grill the diced zucchini, bell pepper, and eggplant until tender and slightly charred.
  3. In a large bowl, combine the cooked quinoa, grilled vegetables, and chickpeas.
  4. Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil, then toss gently to combine.
  5. Garnish with fresh mint before serving.
